message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a price that reflects its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1200000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm a bit stretched on the budget. Can we meet at $900000?

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I still believe the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering it to you for $1100000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm afraid I'm still at $900000. Can you meet me there?
